product_name: Komperdell Carbon Pure Black Ski Poles
long_description: The Komperdell Carbon Pure Black ski poles completes your skiing equipment with lightweight performance and a sleek look. Carbon fiber construction offers featherweight performance. Komperdell Carbon Pure Black ski poles feature an EVA foam grip and adjustable strap. Race basket is designed for packed snow, and steel flex tip offers good purchase on hardpack.
short_description: The Komperdell Carbon Pure Black ski poles completes your skiing equipment with lightweight performance and a sleek look.
